title: As BOC, I want to search for Players who were named later
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there exsist trades in the system with Player to be Named Later considerations
custom_steps: WHEN player conducts an advanced search for Trade transactions
custom_expected:
THEN 'Player to be named later' is an option in the Transaction Type filter under Transactions search
AND All transaction filters can be used for searching for these transactions. Additionally they should show up in search results when doing general transaction searches
AND Results appear with the same column set as other transactions
AND When listing search results, each named player has their own row. Do not include PTBNL sections where player is not yet named.

title: UAT feedback: Draft pick cannot be re-traded
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that club has received a Rule 4 competitive balance lottery draft pick in a trade
custom_steps:
WHEN club creates a trade
AND adds an R4 draft pick consideration
custom_expected: THEN that club can select any picks that they have previously received in a trade

title: As a Club/BOC, I can create an Outright to Mexican League transaction
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the create new button for a minor league player
custom_expected:
THEN there is an option called "Outright to Mexican League" under minor assignments
AND The transaction should have all the same functionality  as a Trade except for some differences which will be covered in later stories
AND "Mex" replaces the 2nd Org on the screen. It is locked to the screen and neither the initiating org nor MEX can be removed
AND Remove the "Add org" button from this transaction
AND There is no "Authorized signatory" field for MEX but there is one for MLB org
AND There is no "Trade Checklist" print option
AND Transaction can be saved as preliminary

title: As Club/BOC, I can submit the Outright to Mex Lg tx to BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has created an OTML and filled in all required fields
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN Transaction appears on the BOC clipboard once submitted to BOC.
AND Status and Dates section is updated.
AND Blue notification is generated
AND Reload page after state change
AND BOC and club should see correct buttons (https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2281404?projectId=14044)
AND Clubs can no longer modify the transaction except for attached forms, auth signatory and comments
AND The player's new Pending Org is set to MEX and Pending club is the Mexican club
- Player history entry is created in green font with description "Outright to Mexican League"

title: As club/BOC, I want to be stopped from creating an OTML tx on a Major league player
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks create new for a major league player
AND tries to select an Outright to Mex league transaction
custom_expected: THEN the user sees the blocker message: "This transaction is for Minor League players only"

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from creating OTML if player is not affiliated with my Org
custom_steps: WHEN user tries to create an OTML for a player that is not affiliated with their org
custom_expected: THEN the user sees a blocker error

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if OTML date is between Reserve list filing date and Rule 5 draft
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that club has created an OTML and filled out all required fields
AND today is after the Reserve list filing date (system date)
AND today is before the Rule 5 draft date (system date)
custom_expected: THEN they see a blocker that says: "You cannot assign a player between the reserve list filing date and the end of the Rule 5 draft"

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from trading a player who is Pending active, Released from roster, or on Bereavement/Paternity/Temp Inactive list
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has created a trade or an OTML
AND the transaction involves a player with one of the following roster statuses:
- Bereavement List
- Paternity List
- Released from Roster
- Temp Inactive
- Pending Active
custom_expected: THEN they see an error message

title: As club/BOC, I can add cash considerations to an OTML transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has created an OTML
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks Add Consideration
AND selects Cash Consideration
custom_expected:
THEN the user can enter an amount
AND the user can enter a pay schedule
AND the "To" field will only allow you to choose Mex clubs that a player is being traded to. Only these clubs will appear in the dropdown
AND If Cash is added to MEX, the "To" field is pre-populated and locked to the MLB Org
AND Payment date is not editable by club

title: As a Club/BOC, I can add additional players to an Outright to Mexican League transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing a preliminary OTML
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks "Add Row" on the Player Consideration
AND selects a player
custom_expected:
THEN user can see all players in the Org (except MJ players) available in the player dropdown
AND There is no "received insurance form" field for any added players
AND Insurance form cannot be printed. There is no label for this form when attaching files
AND there Addendum C logic.
AND The TO ORG is always locked to MEX. The TO CLUB shows a list of MEX clubs
